name: Guess Amiga Game Floppy image
description:
This is a game i have developed all with my effort and mind in programming. It is really simple but attractive. Computer put a list of random numbers from 1 to 10 casually and continuos. The game consist in this: With your mind you have to think a number and  before of the computer write it, if the computer put the same number you won.

The computer do his game and you do your game with it!

Nothing difficult nothing esier!

To run it, use winuae floppy disk image section and load the guess floppy. A good configuration for winuae is an A500 or A1200 or better.
